p: The results of the morphological parameters of wounds and the bacteriological study suggest that both the marigold leaf paste and turmeric paste are similarly effective in healing the incised wound in sheep. However, histopathological studies indicate that the marigold leaf paste is more effective in recovering wounds than the turmeric paste. Therefore, veterinary practitioners may use the pastes of marigold leaf and turmeric as herbal medicine to treat superficial wounds.
